meanings.definition: Resembling a board in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The cardboard box had a boardlike feel to it.
meanings.sent2: The wooden plank was boardlike in its flatness.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the overcooked steak was as boardlike as a piece of plywood.
meanings.sent4: Her expression was so stiff and boardlike, it seemed like she was made of wood.
meanings.sent5: The old book's cover was so worn that it had a boardlike quality to it.

meanings.definition: Having a stiff or rigid quality similar to a board.
meanings.sent1: The frozen pizza was disappointingly boardlike in its texture.
meanings.sent2: The new ruler was so boardlike that it didn't bend at all.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail puffed up and became boardlike when it was scared.
meanings.sent4: His posture was so boardlike, he could easily be mistaken for a statue.
meanings.sent5: The robot's movements were precise and boardlike, mimicking a mechanical toy.
